GSD.description:
select: Fix indefinitely sleeping task in poll_schedule_timeout()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.95 by commit 11ba2c6dfb902de05b73000a98534e376173b6ca. For more details please see the references link.
